sentence.Network_en: A dextral flatfish lies with the right eye uppermost.
sentence.Network_cn: 右侧比目鱼躺着时右边的眼睛朝上.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin dextralis, from Latin dextra 'the right hand', from dexter 'on the right'

sentences.sentence: "a dextral gastropod shell with the apex upward has its opening on the right when facing the observer"
"a dextral flatfish lies with the right eye uppermost"
